sources.title: The Evading Dvdrip Xvid
sources.description: Josh Carter has fallen into a deep depression from the recent loss of his wife. In his delusions he starts to see a black caped figure and becomes entangled in a secret society that works together to learn from the ever changing patterns of IT. As Josh's battles to keep his sanity his memories of the accident start to change. As the events of the tragic accident start to unfold he must come to face the one responsible for her death.
